```{r, include=FALSE}

library(RPostgreSQL)
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")
source("chart_functions.R")

pillars_conn <- connect_to_db("rjs_pillars")

meta<-dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM metadata_race_labels")%>%
  mutate(race_label_short=ifelse(race_base %in% "nh_twoormor", "Two or more", race_label_short))

df <- dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM report_timespent_ficard_race_stop") %>%
  left_join(meta, by=c("race"="race_base"))%>%
  mutate(race_label_short=ifelse(race %in% "nh_multi_race", "Multiracial", race_label_short))%>%
filter(race!="sswana" & race !="aian" & race !="nhpi")

# custom define item chart colors

group_colors_item <- c(meteorite, lavender, orange,peridot, ccblue, "#5F3B63","#A8683C", "#D58424", "#FF9900")

chart <- fx_itemchart(
    df=df, 
    x="race_label_short",
    y="duration_rate", 
    group_colors=group_colors_item,
    # row_nums=5, # integer
    top_finding="SDPD disproportionately spends time on field interview cards for Latinx and Black people relative to their population and other groups",
    subtitle= "Percent of hours officers spent conducting stops that resulted in a field interview card by race",
    tooltip_text="Out of 100 hours spent on <b>officer-initiated stops resulting in a field interview card</b>, SDPD spent <b>{point.duration_rate:.1f}</b> hours conducting field interviews on people perceived as <b>{point.race_label_short}</b>",
    legend_text="Single dot represents 1 hour out of 100 hours",
    caption = paste0(sourcenote," Analysis for all officer-initiated stops resulting in a field interview card only. Officers spent a total of 121,594.5 hours on officer-initiated stops that resulted in a field interview card only in 2022"))    

dbDisconnect(pillars_conn)
```
